= Binary Packages=

For Windows and Mac, application packages are available. This is the easiest way to run ComicTagger.

=== Windows ===

Download the installer .exe and run it.  

=== Mac OS X ===

Download the DMG file, open it, and drag the app onto your Desktop or Applications folder.

= Source =

To run ComicTagger from the python source, you will need to install some pre-requisites:

  * Python 2.7
  * PyQt
  * PIL

See below for some platform-specific details

Once those are in place, just download and extract the source zip file.  On the command-line, change to that directory and run "comictagger.py"
